description: Default custom nodes to install with every deployment

custom_nodes.name: ComfyUI-Manager
custom_nodes.description: Essential node manager for ComfyUI - install/update nodes from UI

custom_nodes.name: ComfyUI-Impact-Pack
custom_nodes.description: Detector, detailer, upscaler, and many utility nodes

custom_nodes.name: ComfyUI-Inspire-Pack
custom_nodes.description: Regional prompting, wildcards, and creative tools

custom_nodes.name: rgthree-comfy
custom_nodes.description: Quality of life nodes - context, reroute, bookmark, etc.

custom_nodes.name: ComfyUI-VideoHelperSuite
custom_nodes.description: Video loading, combining, and export utilities

custom_nodes.name: ComfyUI-Crystools
custom_nodes.description: Essential utility nodes - metadata, debugging, resources monitor
